entry.title: Now
entry.content: What am I up to now? What is a /now page? Doing I am currently wrapping up a PhD on high efficiency RF power amplifier design at Cardiff University’s Centre for High Frequency Engineering.

entry.title: Consulting and Training
entry.content: I am currently wrapping up a PhD on high efficiency RF power amplifier design at Cardiff University’s Centre for High Frequency Engineering.

entry.title: Consulting and Training
entry.content: I am currently working on high efficiency RF power amplifier design as a PhD researcher at Cardiff University’s Centre for High Frequency Engineering.

entry.title: GNU Radio and USRP Training
entry.content: I run workshops and direct training sessions covering Software Defined Radio, GNU Radio, Ettus Research/National Instruments USRP Radios, and the RFNoC FPGA Digital Signal Processing framework.

entry.title: About
entry.content: Hello and welcome to my site. My name is Derek. I’m an electrical engineer with a particular passion for embedded sytems, RF communications, and aerospace applications.

entry.title: Projects
entry.content: Voltage Reference The LTZ1000 is a packaged ultra stable voltage reference with a buried zener diode and heating resistor. I’m building three 10 Volt references based on a design by Dr Frank Stellmach and André Bülau.
